recipe.name: Cecilia Sauce
recipe.preparation: Beat white of egg very stiff.  Add 3/4 cup sugar and beat until it stands in peaks.  Beat yolk of eggs, add to whites.  Beat 3/4 cup cream and add.  Add 1 jigger (or more) of brandy.[Note:  Its hard to say how many eggs are supposed to be in this recipe.  They are specified both singularly and plurally in the preparation.  It seems like a fair amount of other ingredients for just one egg, but perhaps its only to add a bit of creaminess]
